statements.update:
update Pam_WorkPlan set
Id=#Id# Status=#Status# CheckInTime=#CheckInTime# OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# OperatedOn=#OperatedOn# UserId=#UserIdNew# OldManId=#OldManIdNew# WorkItem=#WorkItem# Workload=#Workload# RemindFlag=#RemindFlag# RemindRepeats=#RemindRepeats# PlanPeriod=#PlanPeriod# PlanSchedule=#PlanSchedule# ServerBeginTime=#ServerBeginTime# Remark=#Remark# PlayRepeats=#PlayRepeats#
Status=#StatusW# UserId=#UserId# OldManId=#OldManId#
statements.select:
select 1 as NoUse, u.UserId,u.UserCode,u.UserName,u.UserType,u.Gender as GenderU ,wp.PlanId,WorkItem,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('13001',wp.WorkItem) WorkItemName, wp.Workload ,CAST( wp.Workload as varchar(40))+' 分钟' as WorkloadName,wp.RemindFlag,wp.RemindRepeats,wp.PlanPeriod ,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('13002',wp.PlanPeriod) PlanPeriodName,wp.PlanSchedule,wp.Remark as RemarkWP,wp.ServerBeginTime,wp.PlayRepeats ,p.OldManId,p.OldManName,p.Gender as GenderP,p.Birthday,p.IDNo,p.HealthInsuranceFlag,p.HealthInsuranceNumber, p.SocialInsuranceFlag,p.SocialInsuranceNumber,p.LivingState,p.OldManIdentity,p.AreaId,p.AreaId2,p.AreaId3, p.Address,p.LongitudeS,p.LatitudeS,p.PostCode,p.Tel,p.Mobile,p.Remark as RemarkP from Pub_User u right join Pam_WorkPlan wp on u.UserId=wp.UserId left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo p on wp.OldManId=p.OldManId
wp.PlanId=#PlanId# wp.Id=#Id# wp.Status=#Status# wp.CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') wp.CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') wp.OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# wp.OperatedOn>=to_date(#OperatedOn_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') wp.OperatedOn<=to_date(#OperatedOn_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') wp.UserId=#UserId# wp.OldManId=#OldManId# wp.WorkItem=#WorkItem# wp.Workload=#Workload# wp.RemindFlag=#RemindFlag# wp.RemindRepeats=#RemindRepeats# wp.PlanPeriod=#PlanPeriod# wp.PlanSchedule=#PlanSchedule# wp.ServerBeginTime=#ServerBeginTime# wp.Remark=#Remark# PlayRepeats=#PlayRepeats# $WhereClause$

select x.OldManId,OldManName,$PivotColumnsForSelect$ from Oca_OldManBaseInfo x left join ( select OldManId,$PivotColumns$ from( select oldManId,PlanDate,dbo.JoinStr(ServeInfo) as ServeInfo from (select wp.oldManId,SUBSTRING(CONVERT(varchar(100), wp.PlanDate, 112),1,11) PlanDate ,dbo.JoinStr(cast(isnull(wp.PlanId,'00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') as CHAR(36)) +'|'+cast(wp.WorkItem as char(5)) +'|' + cast(wp.UserId as char(36)) +'|'+u.UserName +'|'+ar.WorkSchedule +'|'+cast(ar.Workload as char(3)) ) as ServeInfo from Pam_WorkPlan wp left join Pam_AssessmentResult ar on wp.OldManId=ar.OldManId and wp.WorkItem=ar.WorkItem left join Pub_User u on u.UserId=wp.UserId where wp.Status=1 and ar.Status=1 group By wp.oldManId, wp.PlanDate ) b group By oldManId, PlanDate ) a pivot(max(ServeInfo) for PlanDate in($PivotColumns$))b ) y on x.OldManId =y.OldManId inner join (select ro.OldManId,ro.RoomId,r.FloorNo from Pam_RoomOldMan ro inner join Pam_Room r on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where ro.EndDate>GETDATE() and r.Status=1 and r.StationId=#StationId# ) z on x.OldManId=z.OldManId where x.StationId=#StationId# and x.Status =3 and x.ResidentStatus =7 z.RoomId=#RoomId# z.FloorNo=#FloorNo# $OldManName$ order by OldManName asc

select Id,Status,OldManId,WorkItem,WorkSchedule,Workload,RemindFlag,RemindRepeats,PlayRepeats,CheckFlag,CheckDescription,SourceTable,SourceId from Pam_AssessmentResult where Status=1 and OldManId=#OldManId# and WorkItem not in (select WorkItem from Pam_WorkPlan where Status=1 and OldManId=#OldManId# and FinishFlag=0 and CompleteStatus=0 and DATEDIFF(d,PlanDate, #PlanDate#)=0) order by WorkSchedule asc
statements.update: delete Pam_WorkPlan where Status=1 and PlanDate>='$CopyTo_Start$' and PlanDate<='$CopyTo_End$' and OldManId in ($OldManIds$) insert into Pam_WorkPlan (PlanId,Status, CheckInTime,OperatedBy,OperatedOn,PlanDate ,RoomId,OldManId,WorkItem,FinishFlag,UserId,Remark,CompleteStatus,WorkloadActual ) select NEWID() PlanId,Status,GETDATE() CheckInTime,'$OperatedBy$' OperatedBy,GETDATE() OperatedOn,dateadd(day,$Days$,PlanDate) PlanDate ,RoomId,OldManId,WorkItem,0 FinishFlag,UserId,Remark,0 CompleteStatus,WorkloadActual from Pam_WorkPlan where Status=1 and PlanDate>='$CopyFrom_Start$' and PlanDate<='$CopyFrom_End$' and OldManId in ($OldManIds$)
statements.delete: delete from Pam_WorkPlan where PlanId in ( select PlanId from Pam_WorkPlan a inner join pub_PensionAgencyUser b on a.UserId=b.UserId where a.PlanDate>GETDATE() and b.StationId=#StationId#)
